title: Parliamentary committee questions NHS performance targets (Scottish Parliament)
text: ( Source : Scottish Parliament ) There is currently no way to assess the level of investment being made by the NHS to fully meet performance targets and a parliamentary committee has today questioned if meeting these targets remains an
